company: UWL DO BRASIL OPERADORA MULTIMODAL LTDA.
description:
BENEFÍCIOS

Vale Alimentação/Refeição: R$1270,00.
Plano de saúde (podendo incluir um dependente custeando 50% da mensalidade).
Plano odontológico.
Aula de inglês 100% custeada pela empresa.
Universidade corporativa.
Auxílio terapia (após período de experiência).

RESPONSIBILITIES

· Qualifies opportunities to determine validity of shipment request.

· Coordinates client needs and requests with internal stakeholders.

· Input Imports data and emit documents through the customer and UWL’s system.

· Account responsibility from a desk level

· Direct support to US operations team

· Review and Update opened files according to the documents if applicable

· Operates day-to-day tasks within a workflow

· Intermediate shipments with operational teams, carriers, and agents

· Troubleshoot of Importer Security Filing - ISF
descriptionHTML:
BENEFÍCIOS

  • Vale Alimentação/Refeição: R$1270,00.
  • Plano de saúde (podendo incluir um dependente custeando 50% da mensalidade).
  • Plano odontológico.
  • Aula de inglês 100% custeada pela empresa.
  • Universidade corporativa.
  • Auxílio terapia (após período de experiência).

RESPONSIBILITIES

  • Qualifies opportunities to determine validity of shipment request.
  • Coordinates client needs and requests with internal stakeholders.
  • Input Imports data and emit documents through the customer and UWL’s system.
  • Account responsibility from a desk level
  • Direct support to US operations team
  • Review and Update opened files according to the documents if applicable
  • Operates day-to-day tasks within a workflow
  • Intermediate shipments with operational teams, carriers, and agents
  • Troubleshoot of Importer Security Filing - ISF
